reviews.review:
En pocas palabras, bueno y adictivo.

Me explico: Lo que es la idea del juego quizas no es fácil llevarla a cabo, te introduces totalmente en el juego, no puedes despistarte, de lo contrario puedes perder la partida(tanto de killer como de survivor), y pocos juegos consiguen esa sensación. Es verdad que hay mucho hateo al juego en lo que a bugs respecta, es verdad que los desarrolladores podrían oír algo más a la comunidad, y lo están empezando a hacer (muchos parches grandes, nerfeando cosas op como el strike, directo de los desarrolladores en youtube explicando la actualidad del juego etc), pero aún les falta un plus.

Cosas negativas pocas; el punto negativo que yo veo más fuerte es que el juego es limitado. Te enganchas a jugar pero solo existen dos modos de juego(killer y survivor), y si le hechas muchas horas te acabas cansando, a veces juegas mas a veces menos, va por epocas.

Espero que el juego siga creciendo más aunque lo veo complicado(no por culpa de los desarrolladores, si no por culpa del juego en sí. Llegará el momento en el que aburrirá),

输入法，网络，配置，问题太多了，即使有朋友陪我玩我也实在是玩不下去了，并且恐怖感比起游戏刚出的时候差远了，除了追逐时的紧张感，游戏已经没什么恐怖与惊悚了，有这闲钱喜加一，不如买一些更有意义的游戏，如果没有朋友陪你玩或者你不是个强大的专业玩家，那么你玩这个游戏只能听到啊啊啊的惨叫声和你被挂上树的鞭尸声。
  不要自己单买来玩！！后果自负！！

es popo

This game is absolutely amazing. Yes there are some bugs and the game is a little demanding on my particular computer, the awesome gameplay and excellent atmosphere make up for it by far. I have spent tons of time (in my eyes) as both survivor and killer and the gameplay mechanics are so unique and original. This is a very fun game to play with friends, and I have several that also own the game. This game gets my heart racing beyond what any game has ever acheived, with the terrifying atmosphere that is a dark map with a killer lurking about, searching for you. I also really enjoy the unique point and ranking system. It doesn't care how long you have been playing or how good you are. The ranking system matches you with other people that are at your same performance level at the current time, rather than with those who have played the same amount of time. Also the bloodweb and consumables are really interesting as well, I rather enjoy those. And the perks are sweet, there are so many you can get and teach other survivors. All in all, despite the bugs that I hardly notice I would very much reccomend it.
Es como la droga Mola

Ein Spiel, das selbst nach langer zeit immer noch Spaß macht zu spielen. Ich erschrecke mich immer noch bei manchen Mördern, ob wohl ich schon seit Beginn dabei bin. Abgesehen von einigen Bugs, die hin und wieder immer noch auftreten, hat das Spiel eine große Entwicklung durchgemacht.

Wenn man bedenkt, dass zu Anfang das match pairing mindestens 2 Stunden gedauert hat... ist es jetzt doch besser. naja kommt manchmal doch noch darauf an um welche Uhrzeit man spielt :D.

I have no idea what the heck happened with this game. I purchased if after the free weekend last autumn and I loved it. Ran smooth, games were easy to find both as a survivor and as a killer. A bit of a blessing, if you like survival coop games. 
Then something happened. The game was patched and it didn't run so smooth anymore. Random freezes, crashes back to desktop, total freezes of the whole computer that required a hard reboot, lag, lag, more lag, games that seemed to start - when you were lucky to find one - then bam you were pushed back to looking for a lobby, and then it began a series of looping failings of finding a lobby. Sometimes when I wanted to play I had to play a match and then restart the game to get into another lobby. I stopped playing for a while, hoping for updates, tried again, same issues again and again and again. 
Seriously, I loved this game. But at the moment, it's completely unplayable. Survive with friends doesn't work. Actually, it never worked. It lags, people disconnects at random times. I really hope they're gonna fix this, because I'd love to play it again without lagging every single step I take. 
And no, it's not my internet that's broken, I've checked multiple times. Speedtests and pings were always spot on. 
At the moment, I can't really recommend this game. Wish I could, I would have back in Autumn when I bought it, but nope. Not now. I may come back and change my mind though.

Great money well spent if you are looking for fun with your freinds or a good scare this is worth the 20 dollars sure the load times arnet the best but its and all around great game i would recomend it!

this is a very fun game. yes it is normally balanced towards the killers, but as long as the survivors work together most of the time the can escape. As someone who tries to play both killer and survivor, i can tell you that when you camp someone on the hook and/or dont even attempt to rescue them your gonna get some hate. I mean thats to be expected, everyone has their own playstyles, so your bound to find people like that. But for me thats what makes it fun. trying to figure out what people will do when faced with different problems and playstyles. so yes i recommend this game, but thats mostly because im used to how people play. now i hope to see you in the Fog.

Игра хорошая. Если играть с друзьями,берегись то что можешь их потерять). 
Насчёт камьюнити,то оно 50/50,но больше неадокватов. 
Манны там тоже разные (Кемперы,тунеллеры,итд),но есть и нормальные. 
Вообщем всё зависит от того с каким Маньяком ты попадёшься. 
Против каждого маньяка,нужно правильно играть,или хотя-бы уметь мутить 360,180 (Помогает против всех). 
Скилл в игре решает,и также как и комманда. Не желательно всем лесть и спасать 1 сурва на крюке (Если только не фейс кемпер). 
Помогайте другим,умейте убегать и уварачиватся,и тогда игра вам будет по нраву. 
Или же играйте за злого маньяка,убивающих хладнокровно своих жертв.
Всё зависит от вас! Удачи и не будьте неадокватом)))
<3

20-40 часов. Вам будет страшно. Вы будете бояться попасться маньяку на глаза, и  будете часто сидеть в шкафу.
100-150  часов. Вы уже уверенно чините генераторы и пытаетесь мансить, и уже не боитесь маньяка.
От 300 часов. Вы уже свободно приседаете перед маньяком, и слепите ему фонарем в лицо каждый матч..

Im so close to saying recommended because I like the game but I just cant. The game is so favoured to killers over survivors its not funny, which I dont understand because you can lose as a survivor and die with 1000 points but a killer who doesnt kill anyone can get min 7000. Especially since they nerfed survivors but boosted killer perks. Thats not even in addition to killers being able to cheat so easily, with no penalties. Killer hosts the lobby so they can disconnect and you lose all your points for the game u spent 10+ mins finding, knowing the killer only lost 3 pips on a ranking system that means pretty much nothing, so whoever thought of that, wtf. They can camp, rage quit, lag switch, work with a survivor, you name it. AND ON TOP OF THAT. There is a plethera of bugs and glitches. It took them 6 months to put in automatic lobby searching as a team and the current bugs I am still having TO THIS DAY is I equip an item in lobby, I bring it in but I cant use it and I lose it if I die. I cant wiggle or self heal, which is literally a waste of 2 perk slots if that happens. These bugs happen to me every 3/4 games but no response from the team and I've had these problems over 4 months now. There is also a random bug where I cant see the scoreboard or spectate at the end of the game and this is frequent as well. I think DBD makers havent been putting in the attention that a game needs to stay relevant. It was a great idea, killers and survivor characters are well thought out and are great, but the actual execution of the game is poorly executed and the team responds poorly. When Friday the 13th and Last Year arrive, this will fade into obscurity unless they get their ass in gear and stop treating it like a cash grab. So unless you want to spend 3 hours playing about 5x10 min games where you survive one, dont buy it or wait for a biiiiiiiiiiiiggggg sale

А так-же хотелось бы иметь внутреигровой войс чат, который слышали бы все, но по разному на разном растоянии. Ну а ещё этот один из не многих товаров, в который я не забросил играть на 14 часу. В общем советую всем. Только перед игрой советую собрать пати в скайпе, Discor или Raid Call чтоб ващи шансы на выжевание были больше.

다른건 다 모르겠고 일단 티배깅이 제일 심함. 살인마라는 글자의 의미를 내가 잘못 알았나 싶을 정도임. 살인마면 사람을 죽이는건데, 허구한날 생존자들한테 티배깅 당하면서 농락당하는거 진짜 안쓰러움. 고수들은 안그런다는 사람이 있는데, 유튜브 들어가서 보고 오는걸 추천함. 풀퍽으로 아무리 잘해도 열에 두번은 티배깅 당함. 오죽하면 살인마 유저가 살인마 때려치고 생존자를 하겠음? 풀퍽으로 무장한 올드비들도 티배깅 싫어하는데, 퍽 하나 없는 뉴비들은? 뺑뺑이도 힘들어하는데 판자 맞고, 손전등 맞고, 사보까지 해대면 진짜 핵노답임. 특히 보라색 손전등. 스치기만 해도 켜지는데 어쩔수가 없음. 그냥 맞아야됨.
틀림없이 내가 게임 시작할때까지만 해도 생존자 무한 뺑뺑이 가능했고, 살인마는 그걸 못잡아도 어쩔 수 없는 상황이었음. 근데 그때도 캠핑은 매너가 아니라면서, 티배깅은 꾸준히 많이 하는거 보니 참 묘했음. 
못해도 즐겁게 하고 싶은거지, 농락당하면서 굴욕감을 곱씹으며 실력을 키우고 싶은게 아님. 게임을 누가 스트레스 받으면서까지 함? 게임은 원래 스트레스 풀려고 하는거 아님?
생존자면 몰라도, 살인마부터 시작하려는 뉴비들은 환불해도 이상하지 않을 정도임. 이거 사서 하는것보다 다른데에 현질하는게 훨씬 정신건강에 이로우니, 새로 시작하시려는 분들 있으면 당장 때려치셈.

Then, they feel humiliated, and give up a game and stop playing this game. Actually, My friends refunded 'Dead by Daylight' because of tea bagging. Who wants to get stress while he or she play a games?

I honestly like this game.  It is a touch watered down in terms of sheer terror.  The monster is not an omnipotent killing machine and as a dedicated monster player, team tactics against newer players can present a turnoff for people that are fans of a horror genre.  You have to remember that everything about this game is balance.  Don't go into this expecting a one sided blood bath.  The fun is multiplied if you can bring your friends into a match with you.

В игре порой бывает дахринища багов , но как только они исправляются , появляются новые.Я как игрок наиграшвий в эту ДБД могу сказать , что игра со временем надоедает .Море DLS И всякого такого игрушка разработана на скиле и имбе стороны выживших и маньяка . Игра порой бывает не сбалансирована

Without a doubt when this game came out it was so fun, but after all the updates and patches came out the killer is so overpowered and beyond effortless it is idiotic. I can play killer hook one person and still have over 10k. easy blood points. but on the reverse playing survivors is basically a beat down and punishment then if you want to survive with your friends its a 14 hr wait for a queue with more than 2 people. And each time I hear about a patch it just makes the killers so much more at an advantage. I really wish you could be challanged as a killer. Survivors are at such a disadvantage that if the killer can simply watch the victim its an effortless down and Iron grasp is basically a free hook. With tier 2 or better you can take a person to the basement from accross the map. And if the hooks regen then there is no effective counter to it. I hope that one day the developers pull their heads out of their asses and figure out this game is totally onesided.

This game is a  very intense game of hide and seek where you and three other players have to reapair generator in order to escape from your killer but if you cant do it then you will all be doomed. Lo compre sin leer ningun analisis, confiando en que la experiencia que ofrecian era autentica y original.
Afortunadamente, me econtre con un juego entretenido, al que no le faltan momentos en que el corazon te salta del pecho, sin embargo evidentemente faltan detalles que pulir.

En lo que se refiere a ambientacion y a los DLC, una cosas me parecio increibles que NO halla sido incluida:
Todo personale tiene una musica que lo caracteriza, por ejemplo aun cuando no estes viendo en la TV a Michael Myers, pero la musica se este escuchando, sabes sin dudas que se trata de èl. Entonces porque cuando me compre la DLC de Halloween y jugue como Myers, solo escuche la musica en el menu principal? Deberia estar durante el juego tambien ... Por favor arreglen eso, la musica en las paliculas y juegos de terror es parte fundamental para que todo el conjunto funcione.

Ojala los programadores no se olviden de quienes compraron el juego y sigan mejorandolo en todos los aspectos.


El juego es recomedable sin dudas.

[h1]พี่ครับเป็นไรครับ[/h1]
这游戏玩了一年多了，虽然很多bug，但还是很好玩的，制作组加油！

В целом игра нравится, наиграно около 1к часов, были баги, неуместные нерфы и подобная дрянь но в целом нравилось, а теперь наши "толерантные" и "миротворные" разрабы решили показать что они крутые и возвели русских в плохом свете убрав игру с магазина...
"Мы против расизма" - убирают возможность буббе сделать маску клодет потому что она чёрная.
Также они: делают акты расизма. Умно, умно. Конечно, я понимаю, что убрали по сути только донат, но если прочитать FAQ разработчиков, у них частоупотребляемая фраза - "На данный момент..." И начинают заливать, что не будет ограничение к серверам и т д, однако, стоит уже готовится к тому, что убирание доната лишь начало конца.
